alert.note: Alert for Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 7:04PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Smith County through 730 PM CDT... At 704 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Athol, or 24 miles east of Phillipsburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Smith Center around 715 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lebanon and Bellaire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
